page.title: 08HOME LIFE: BANK COTTAGE
page.content: We enjoyed the owner's accent as he told us about his life, all of which he has spent in Bank Cottage, Chillerton. He has one daughter. Besides a few crops which grow in a little field, his land produces grass and weeds. He uses muck and fertiliser spreaders and a combine harvester. The owner keeps cows but he is not too happy about the number of people who use his land as a play area. He would like to see a more frequent bus service for the people of Chillerton who have so few local shops to cater for their needs. He, himself, has a car but it is not brand new.
